function.name: X/Y/Z
function.short: X, Y, Z components of a quaternion
function.syntax: r = x(q), r = y(q), r = z(q)

long.para: These three functions extract the three components of the vector part of a quaternion. The result is a real (or a complex value if the quaternion has complex components).

examples.precode:
>> q = quaternion(1, 2, 3, 4)
q = +1 +2 I +3 J +4 K
>> y(q)
ans = 3
>> q = randq(2)
q = 2x2 quaternion array
>> x(q)
ans =
-0.2900 -0.1664 0.2511 -0.2816
